(There may be more members

Nemesis Enforcer/The Oblitercons/Punch/Jaws/Scattershot:



Punch sat at his usual post at the main computer, except now inside the Iron 
Fist rather than the old Alliance base.  He watched the Oblitercons as they 
grumbled, not happy about finding out they'd just been assigned as Nemesis' 
body guards.  But they were soon silenced by a pay increase of liquid energon.

Nemesis had received reports from a dozen Alliance members and he expected 
more, but he wasn't about to sit on his skidplate and do nothing.  Action was 
needed.  He seemed to be a little out of the loop though.  He activated his 
wide broadcast to all Alliance members.

"This is your leader, Nemesis Enforcer, shiny Nemesis, mighty Nemesis.  
This...spy...mission will be put on hold until I know more info.  So 
Wheeljack I'll be on my way to have a little convo. with you.  Keep reporting 
in, all Alliance members, if you haven't done so already.  Maintain your 
positions, defenses on Alliance Island will be put on full alert."  The 
leader of the Alliance said, giving a nod to Punch and then the Oblitercons 
as Dark One and Pyro stepped in front of him to lead the way as they headed 
towards the laboratory, Mortar, Hiss, and Scrounge leading the behind of the 
group.

Punch pressed a few buttons, weapons all over the Alliance Island activating 
and weapons coming online.  Sensors powered up fully, sweeping over every 
inch there range allowed.

---

Jaws just continued swimming, almost always on patrol anyway.

===

Scatterblaster kind of ignored Nemesis' transmission, sitting in his 
character and waxing his armor as it had grown in size.
